pages.text: In this chapter, we'll cover the fundamentals of magic, including its origins, its various forms, and its role in the world of Infernal Nature.$(br)$(li)Origins of Magic (Gem Ores)$(li)Forms of Magic (Fragments)$(li)The Role of Magic (Wands)

$(l)Origins of Magic$()$(br2)The origins of magic can be traced back to ancient mages, the first people to explore the mysteries of the natural world. To start your journey, you'll need to find a source of magic, such as a gem ore.
$(l)Forms of Magic$()$(br2)Magic takes 3 forms Infernal, Nature and Mystic these fragments dropped from Gem Ores can be combined into gems.

$(l)The Role of Magic$()$(br2)Magic plays a crucial role in the world of Infernal Nature. From the summoning of portals to the creation of powerful artifacts.$(br2)Let's start by crafting a crude wand, you can use any two fragments and a stick to craft the wand, according to your preference.
